items.sentence: Tom and I talked about Mary's boyfriend for a long time.
The best thing to do in a case like this is to be quiet.
Mr. Jackson has been teaching us French for three years.
When Mary's husband died, she felt like killing herself.
By the time Tom got to the store, it was already closed.
I'm afraid I won't be able to have lunch with you today.
I'm sorry, I'm not allowed to give you that information.
The book I'm planning to read next weekend is in French.
Tom is in that store over there, buying a pair of shoes.
Thanks, I don't want anything more to eat at the moment.
